description: The product in display is 3 in 1 Bench Multipurpose Fitness. This multipurpose bench for weight training for regular exercise Incline, decline and flat bench press. 3 in 1 bench Adjustable bench for Light , Medium weight training . Black Finish, 2" x 2" Structured Frame. 2" X 2" structured frame. Fully Padded Soft Cushioned Seats For extra Comfort. Easily Assembled. Carry Weight upto 120 Kg.
